description: Registry of user-approved AI-generated workflows. These are separate from template-index.json and only merged on explicit user action.

entry_format.category: string - one of: planning, execution, analysis, project, monitoring
entry_format.description: string - one-line description of what the workflow does
entry_format.patterns: array - 3-8 intent phrases that trigger this workflow
entry_format.generated_at: string - ISO timestamp when workflow was generated
entry_format.original_request: string - the user request that triggered generation

_usage_notes: This file is separate from template-index.json
Workflows here were generated by AI and approved by user
To add to main templates, manually copy entry to template-index.json
Generated workflow files are stored in workflows/generated/{id}.md
The generated-index.json is checked by route-intent.md as a secondary source
Entries follow the same schema as template-index.json plus generation metadata
